MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.45pm to make repairs to an underground cable fault on Dovecot Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.22pm on 8th January 2021.
